entry.title: OPI Gel Polish #N76 From Dusk til Dune - GelColor
entry.summary:
Vendor: OPI
Type: Gel Polish
Price: 17.99

Shine-intense OPI GelColor nail shades cure in 30 seconds under a LED light and last for weeks.

  • Up to 3 weeks of shine-intense wear and stay-true color.
  • Soak-off removal
  • Fully cures in 30 seconds under OPI LED Light, so your nails are 100% dry and smudge-proof immediately after gel manicure service.
  • Quick service time.
  • Lightweight feel on fingers

Made in the USA.

entry.title: OPI Long Lasting Nail Polish #N76 From Dusk til Dune - Infinite Shine
entry.summary:
Vendor: OPI
Type: Long Lasting Nail Polish
Price: 7.50

Stay-true color and shine for up to 11 days of wear with ProStay Technology

  • Gel-like high shine finish.
  • Applies and removes easily like a regular nail polish. Soak free removal. 
  • No UV or LED light needed.
The Infinite Shine system of products combine for longer-lasting color and shine:
  1. Step 1 Primer: Goes beyond base - it actually primes nails for a revolutionary grip on color while preventing staining.
  2. Step 2 Lacquer: Delivers real depth with ultra-rich, vivid color.
  3. Step 3 Gloss: Promises gel-like durability - the state-of-the-art formula includes gel polymers that cures to a hard film in natural light, yet removes easily without soaking.

entry.title: OPI Nail Polish #N77 Coastal Sand-tuary - Nail Lacquer
entry.summary:
Vendor: OPI
Type: Nail Polish
Price: 5.50

OPI Nail lacquer is the original nail polish formula that reinvented quality nail color.

Benefits:

  • Available in 200+ including OPI's most iconic shades.
  • Up to 7 days of wear.
  • For best results, use with OPI Natural Base Coat and OPI Top Coat.

How to use:

  1. Step 1. Start by applying OPI Base Coat to clean, dry nails with cuticles pushed back.
  2. Step 2. For a perfect polish, apply one stroke of nail lacquer down the center of the nail, followed by one stroke along each side of the nail.
  3. Step 3. Then apply a second coat of nail lacquer, pulling color over the tips of the nails.
  4. Step 4. Shine, seal, and protect with one coat of OPI Top Coat , pulling it over the tips of the nails.
  5. Step 5. For a manicure that's dry to the touch in minutes, apply 2 drops of DripDry Lacquer Drying Drops to each nail.
